node.label: Process Definition
node.desc: Process definition

node.label: Process Definition ID
node.desc: Process definition unique identifier

node.label: Process Definition Name
node.desc: Process definition name

node.label: Process Definition Display Name
node.desc: Process definition display name

node.label: Process Definition Owner
node.desc: Creator of process definition

node.label: Process Definition Version
node.desc: Process definition version, one process probably has multiple versions

node.label: Process Definition Current State
node.desc: Process definition current state, 1 means unpublished, 3 means published

node.label: Is Process Definition Latest Version
node.desc: Whether current process definition is latest versoin in the version tree, 1 means latest version, 0 means not

node.label: Process Definition Create Time
node.desc: Time that process definition is submitted for the first time

node.label: Process Definition Deployer
node.desc: User who submit process definition for the first time, if submitted by Studio, this deployer is inner system user: internal

node.label: Process Definition Package ID
node.desc: Package unique identifier of process definition, default value is BPS_DEFAULT

node.label: Process Definition Package Name
node.desc: Package name of process definition

node.label: Process Definition Update Time
node.desc: Time that process definition is submitted for the last time

node.label: Previous Activity Definition
node.desc: Startpoint activity definition of current wire

node.label: Previous Activity Definition ID
node.desc: Unique identifier of startpoint activity definition of current wire

node.label: Previous Activity Definition Name
node.desc: Name of startpoint activity definition of current wire

node.label: Previous Activity Definition Participant Type
node.desc: Participant type of startpoint activity definition of current wire

node.label: Previous Activity Aggregation Mode
node.desc: Aggregation mode of startpoint activity definition of current wire

node.label: Previous Activity Branch Mode
node.desc: Branch mode of startpoint activity definition of current wire

node.label: Previous Activity Definition Priority
node.desc: Activity priority of startpoint activity definition of current wire

node.label: Previous Activity Type
node.desc: Activity type of startpoint activity definition of current wire

node.label: Previous Activity URL Type
node.desc: URL type that defined in activity definition, when startpoint activity of current wire is manual activity

node.label: Previous Activity URL
node.desc: URL that defined in activity definition, when startpoint activity of current wire is manual activity

node.label: Is Previous Activity Allow Entrusted
node.desc: Whether startpoint activity of current wire allows entrusted when it is manual activity, return true if it allows, return false if not

node.label: Is Previous Activity Multi-WorkItem
node.desc: Whether startpoint activity of current wire is defined multi-workitem when it is manual activity, return true if it is, return false if not

node.label: Next Activity Definition
node.desc: Endpoint activity definition of current wire

node.label: Next Activity Definition ID
node.desc: Unique identifier of endpoint activity definition of current wire

node.label: Next Activity Definition Name
node.desc: Name of endpoint activity definition of current wire

node.label: Next Activity Definition Participant Type
node.desc: Participant type of endpoint activity definition of current wire

node.label: Next Activity Aggregation Mode
node.desc: Aggregation mode of endpoint activity definition of current wire

node.label: Next Activity Branch Mode
node.desc: Branch mode of endpoint activity definition of current wire

node.label: Next Activity Definition Priority
node.desc: Activity priority of endpoint activity definition of current wire

node.label: Next Activity Type
node.desc: Activity type of endpoint activity definition of current wire

node.label: Next Activity URL Type
node.desc: URL type that defined in activity definition, when endpoint activity of current wire is manual activity

node.label: Next Activity URL
node.desc: URL that defined in activity definition, when endpoint activity of current wire is manual activity

node.label: Is Next Activity Allow Entrusted
node.desc: Whether endpoint activity of current wire allows entrusted when it is manual activity, return true if it allows, return false if not

node.label: Is Next Activity Multi-WorkItem
node.desc: Whether endpoint activity of current wire is defined multi-workitem when it is manual activity, return true if it is, return false if not

node.label: Process Instance
node.desc: Process instance of referenced rule

node.label: Process Instance ID
node.desc: Unique identifier of current process instance

node.label: Process Instance Description
node.desc: Description of current process instance

node.label: Process Instance Name
node.desc: Name of current process instance

node.label: Process Instance Create Time
node.desc: Create time of current process instance

node.label: Process Instance Creator
node.desc: Creator of current process instance

node.label: Process Instance Current State
node.desc: Current state of process instance, please refer to help document about process instance state

node.label: Process Instance End Time
node.desc: End time of current process instance

node.label: Is Process Instance Timeout
node.desc: Whether current process instance is timeout, N means not timeout, Y means already timeout

node.label: Process Instance Time Limit Number
node.desc: The total time that supposed to cost from process instance start to end as defined, return value format is: xx minute

node.label: Process Instance Time Limit Description
node.desc: Description of the total time that supposed to cost from process instance start to end as defined, return value format is: XX day XX hour XX minute

node.label: Process Instance Starter
node.desc: Starter of current process instance

node.label: Parent Activity Instance ID
node.desc: The activity instance ID of parent process instance that calls current process instance, if current process instance is sub-process instance

node.label: Parent Process Instance ID
node.desc: The parent process instance ID that calls current process instance, if current process instance is a sub-process instance

node.label: Process Instance Reminder Time
node.desc: Reminder time of current process instance before timeout, format is yyyyMMDDHHmmss

node.label: Process Instance Start Time
node.desc: Start time of current process instance

node.label: Process Instance Exceeded Time
node.desc: The number of minutes that current process instance has exceeded the time limit, this value is 0 when it is not timeout

node.label: Process Instance Exceeded Time Description
node.desc: Description of the time that current process instance has exceeded the time limit, format is: XX day XX hour XX minute
